camera_gear.aperture: f/16 (Small aperture to extend exposure time and ensure deep depth of field)

lighting_setup.weather: Cloudy/Overcast sky creating a soft, diffuse, high-key white background
lighting_setup.lighting_direction: Mixed: Omni-directional soft skylight + Internal Warm Emission + Dynamic Street lighting
lighting_setup.quality: Soft shadowless ambient light contrasting with the hard streaks of car lights
lighting_setup.artificial_light: 4000K interior office lighting, Amber and White horizontal light trails

color_grading.palette: White & Gold with Red Accents; Dominant cool white sky vs. Warm yellow interiors vs. Light red taillight streaks
color_grading.contrast: Medium-High (emphasizing the glowing box effect against the pale sky)

texture_quality.details: Razor-sharp vertical mullions, clear visibility of interior furniture through glass
texture_quality.surface_descriptions: Translucent glass, motion-blurred light streaks on asphalt

atmosphere.feeling: The intersection of stillness (architecture) and speed (city life)

technical_quality.post_processing: Motion Blur capture (Light Trails), Perspective Correction (Shift), Highlight compression
technical_quality.white_balance: Daylight (5500K) - Keeping the building structure neutral/cool, making the tungsten interior appear soft orange
technical_quality.dynamic_range: High (Balancing the bright overcast sky with the interior luminance)
